oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: |han=kass'o (Klein Jantje) (VIII)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The male Ostrich believed to possess the power of returning once to life. (L VIII.31. 8750 rev.-8752 rev.). The male ostrich is the one who returns to life after it has died and is called ||khabbi-ssin. The hen ostrich really dies and does not return to life. 1) This story is found in Book VIII-31.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Regarding the living again of male ostriches
